pages.name: Serenade of the Nether
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner)Ritual Diviner$(/l) for easier construction.
Generates a source of lava from the master ritual stone.$(br2)$(fire)Fire Runes: 4$()$(br2)Total Runes: 4

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Decreases the LP cost of placing lava and allows the lava to be directly placed into a tank or other fluid-handling block.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: Entities within range that are immune to fire (e.g. pigmen, blazes) are damaged severely.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Entities in this range are afflicted by Fire Fuse. When the debuff ends, they will do a wonderful impression of a firework.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Lava placement range is increased based on the total amount of $(destructive)Destructive Will$() in the Aura.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Players in this range have Fire Resist applied.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Lava) The area that the ritual will place lava source blocks. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 9 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 3 $(li)Vertical Radius: 3

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Corrosive) Entities within this range that are immune to fire damage are hurt proportional to the Will. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 10 $(li)Vertical Radius: 10
